onyomiExamples.meaning: nth year in the Heisei era (1989.1.8-2019.4.30)
Tenpyō era (729.8.5-749.4.14), Tenbyō era, Tenhei era
first tone in old Chinese phonetics, level tone, (of a Japanese accent) having a low, flat tone
(in Japan) 3rd note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. E), hyōjō mode (one of the six main gagaku modes)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: flat, level, even, smooth, calm, tranquil, placid, composed, stable, relaxed (sitting posture), comfortable, plateau, tableland, plain
to eat up (completely), to put down (a rebellion), to suppress, to subjugate, to make flat, to level out
something broad and flat, common, ordinary, plain, rank-and-file, low-ranking employee, freshman, novice, private
hakama fabric made from meisen silk
